name: Red in pocket and white safety
description: Pot the red with top spin to get the white back behind the baulk line near to the cushion. Repeat the same shot but from the other side of the table.

name: Pot red and stop white
description: Pot the red into the top pocket with a powerful stun shot to stop the white on impact. Lengthen the cue to generate the power and try the shot from both side of the table.

name: Pot red straight
description: Pocket all the reds, setting the white ball straight to pot each time.

name: Red to black - side cushion
description: Play the shot with top spin to gain position on the black ball (the white ball bouncing to the side cushion). Try to also pot the black ball.

name: Red to black - top cushion
description: Play the shot with top spin to gain position on the black ball (the white ball bouncing to the top cushion). Try to also pot the black ball.
